mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_MEMBER (ID, PW, NAME, NICKNAME, BIRTHDATE, GENDER) VALUES (#{ID}, #{PW}, #{NAME}, #{NICKNAME}, #{BIRTHDATE}, #{GENDER});
INSERT INTO T_MAIL (email, email_key, issueDate, expiredDate) VALUES (#{email}, #{email_key}, #{issueDate}, #{expiredDate});
mapper.select: SELECT A.LOG_NUM, A.ID, A.M_TITLE, A.M_ARTIST FROM T_LOG A
select * from ( select * from T_LOG order by LOG_NUM desc) as T1 where T1.ID = #{ID} limit #{startNo}, 4
